text: Tethea oberthueri is a moth in the family Drepanidae. It is found in Burma, Nepal, Malaysia, India, China, Taiwan and also on Borneo. ==Subspecies== *Tethea oberthueri oberthueri (India, Burma, Nepal, Malaysia, China: Shaanxi, Zhejiang, Hubei, Hunan, Fujian, Hainan, Guangxi, Sichuan, Yunnan, Tibet) *Tethea oberthueri baluensis Werny, 1966 (Borneo) *Tethea oberthueri taiwana (Matsumura, 1931) (Taiwan) ==References== Category:Moths described in 1921 Category:Thyatirinae
title: Tethea oberthueri
